device_mount: Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Handheld; Stacked
contribution_desc: Proposes system to use small display-tangibles (Sifteos) for collaborative data analysis. Includes a set of interaction techniques with the tangibles, and matching viz techniques.
tracking_characteristic: Inside-out tracking; Positioning left/right; Relative location
crossdevice_def: Mostly focusing on tangibles + large surface/tabletop
